DOC.brief_summary: A study ass bioavailability single dose MR902 ass effect food absorption
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) , Bioavailability & Food Effect MR902 Compared With Immediate Release ( IR ) Morphine Sulphate Oral Solution
DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers receive single dose investigational drug 2 occasion reference drug 1 occasion . Volunteers randomise one two group , group receive different dose strength MR902 fed fast state . The study involve screen visit 21 day first dose 3 overnight stay 3 study period , post-study medical visit . Volunteers receive naltrexone reduce anticipate opioid side effect .
DOC.criteria: Healthy free significant abnormal finding determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory test ECG . Body weight range 55 100 kg BMI ≥ 18.5 ≤ 30.0 . Willing eat food supply throughout study . The subject 's primary care physician confirm within last 12 month first dose nothing medical history would preclude enrolment clinical study . Female subject pregnant lactating . Any history drug alcohol abuse , misuse , physical psychological dependence . Any history condition might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion . Use opioid opioid antagonistcontaining medication past 30 day . Any history frequent nausea vomit regardless etiology . Any history seizures symptomatic head trauma . History respiratory depression , hypoxia elevate carbon dioxide level blood . History paralytic ileus , gastrointestinal disease clinically significant gastrointestinal problem . Participation clinical drug study 90 day precede initial dose study . Any significant illness 4 week precede entry study . Use medication include vitamin , herbal and/or mineral supplement 7 day precede initial dose course study ( exception continue use HRT contraceptive ) . History smoke within 60 day IMP administration refusal abstain smoking study .
